overview: Mr. Richard Andrews brings 28 years of experience in developing, managing and financing new ventures in biologicals, diagnostics and medical devices to his role at Thrasos. Prior to joining Thrasos, Mr. Andrews was the business founder and CEO of RenaMed Biologics, and prior to that led clinical operations at VascA, Inc. Mr. Andrews has spent most of his career in business development, focused on products and services for treating acute and chronic renal failure. Mr. Andrews is trained as a physical biochemist and in the management of technology. He received a B.S. in Chemistry from Hobart College, an M.S. in Chemistry from Purdue University and a S.M. in Technology and Policy from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
